admin
*****


Description
===========

Admin operations for streaming service


Available Commands
==================

* archiver

  * create

  * get

  * start

  * stop

  * update

* connect-harness

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* stream

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* stream-pool

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update
